faq.q1: What is the range of your electric bikes?
faq.a1: Our electric bikes offer ranges from 80km to 120km on a single charge, depending on the model, terrain, rider weight, and pedal assistance level used.
faq.q2: Are your electric bikes legal in Australia?
faq.a2: Yes, all our electric bikes comply with Australian regulations, limited to 250W continuous power output and 25km/h maximum assisted speed.
faq.a3: Absolutely! We provide comprehensive after-sales service including regular maintenance, repairs, and parts replacement for all our electric bikes.
faq.q4: Can I test ride before purchasing?
faq.a4: Yes, we encourage test rides at our Sunshine Coast location. Contact us to schedule a convenient time for your test ride.
faq.a5: All our electric bikes come with a 2-year warranty on the frame, motor, and electrical components, and a 1-year warranty on the battery.
